SEARCH
Package catan.ceng.catanui.entities

Class CatanGame

java.lang.Object
catan.ceng.catanui.entities.CatanGame
public class CatanGame extends Object
The CatanGame class represents a game of Catan. It manages the game state, including the players, hexagons, roads, settlements, and provides methods to perform game-related actions such as adding hexagons, updating the longest road, ending turns, and checking for game over conditions.

      Returns:

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Ends the turn of the current player, moving to the next player's turn.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over based on player scores.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • addRoad

      public Road addRoad(double startX1, double startY1, double endX1, double endY1, Hexagon hexagon)
      Adds a road to the game, associating it with a hexagon.
      Parameters:
      startX1 - The x-coordinate of the starting point of the road.
      startY1 - The y-coordinate of the starting point of the road.
      endX1 - The x-coordinate of the ending point of the road.
      endY1 - The y-coordinate of the ending point of the road.
      hexagon - The hexagon associated with the road.
      Returns:
      The added road, or null if the road intersects (already exists) with existing roads.

    • addSettlement

      public Settlement addSettlement(double centerX, double centerY, Hexagon hexagon)
      Adds a settlement to the game, associating it with a hexagon.
      Parameters:
      centerX - The x-coordinate of the center of the settlement.
      centerY - The y-coordinate of the center of the settlement.
      hexagon - The hexagon associated with the settlement.
      Returns:
      The added settlement, or null if the settlement overlaps with existing settlements.

    • isSettlementPossible

      public boolean isSettlementPossible(Settlement settlement)
      Checks if placing a settlement at a specific location is possible without violating game rules.
      Parameters:
      settlement - The settlement to be placed.
      Returns:
      true if placing the settlement is possible, false otherwise.

    • handleResources

      public void handleResources(int sum)
      Distributes resources based on the sum of the dice roll to settlements on specific hexagons.
      Parameters:
      sum - The sum of the dice roll.
